item.title: Feebee add a quote by Flannery O'Connor
item.description: "The truth does not change according to our ability to stomach it." -- Flannery O'Connor

item.title: Feebee add a quote by Cormac McCarthy
item.description: "Once there were brook trout in the streams in the mountains. You could see them standing in the amber current where the white edges of their fins wimpled softly in the flow. They smelled of moss in your hand. Polished and muscular and torsional. On their backs were vermiculate patterns that were maps of the world in its becoming. Maps and mazes. Of a thing which could not be put back. Not be made right again. In the deep glens where they lived all things were older than man and they hummed of mystery." -- Cormac McCarthy

item.title: Feebee add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "When the going gets weird, the weird turn professional." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Feebee add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "I have a theory that the truth is never told during the nine-to-five hours." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Feebee add a quote by St. Augustine
item.description: "The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page." -- St. Augustine

item.title: Feebee add a quote by St. Augustine
item.description: "Complete abstinence is easier than perfect moderation." -- St. Augustine

item.title: Feebee add a quote by Samuel Beckett
item.description: "You're on Earth. There's no cure for that." -- Samuel Beckett

item.title: Feebee add a quote by Carson McCullers
item.description: "We are homesick most for the places we have never known." -- Carson McCullers
